original: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //🔽rab 'byor / chen po stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo // rab 'byor / chen po stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of emptiness is also deep.🔽“Subhūti, emptiness of great extent is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //🔽rab 'byor / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo // rab 'byor / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of ultimate reality is also deep.🔽“Subhūti, emptiness of conditioned phenomena is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //🔽rab 'byor; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo // rab 'byor; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of beyond extremes is also deep.🔽“Subhūti, emptiness of no beginning and no end is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of nonrepudiation is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of a basic nature is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of all phenomena is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of its own mark is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, emptiness of nonapprehension is also deep.

original: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //🔽rab 'byor / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo // rab 'byor / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the emptiness of non-existent things is profound.🔽“Subhūti, the emptiness of essential nature is profound.

original: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo //🔽rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo // rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existent things is profound.🔽“Subhūti, the applications of mindfulness are profound.

original: rab 'byor / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the right efforts are profound.

original: rab 'byor / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang zab bo //🔽rab 'byor / dbang po rnams kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang zab bo // rab 'byor / dbang po rnams kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the legs of miraculous power are profound.🔽“Subhūti, the faculties are profound.

original: rab 'byor / stobs rnams kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / stobs rnams kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the powers are profound.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang zab bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the branches of awakening are profound.

analyzed: rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang zab bo // rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams @162b kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / bsam gtan rnams kyang zab bo //

original: rab 'byor / tshad med pa rnams kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / tshad med pa rnams kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa rnams kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang zab bo //
translated: Subhūti, the emptiness gate to liberation, the signless gate to liberation, and the wishless gate to liberation are deep.

original: rab 'byor / mngon par shes pa rnams kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mngon par shes pa rnams kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang zab bo // rab 'byor / byams pa chen po'ang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / snying rje chen po'ang zab bo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang zab bo //

original: rab 'byor / rang byang chub kyang zab bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rang byang chub kyang zab bo //

analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zab /
translated: How are the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are the gateways to liberation profound?

original: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams zab /
translated: How are the higher knowledges profound?

original: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams zab /
translated: How are the meditative stabilities profound?

original: ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab /
translated: How are the dhāraṇī gateways profound?

original: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab /
translated: “How are the powers of the tathāgatas profound?

original: ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnams zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnams zab /
translated: How are the four fearlessnesses profound?

original: ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zab /🔽ji ltar na byams pa chen po zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zab / ji ltar na byams pa chen po zab /
translated: How are the four detailed and thorough knowledges profound?🔽How is great love profound?

original: ji ltar na snying rje chen po zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na snying rje chen po zab /
translated: How is great compassion profound?

original: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa @164b bco brgyad zab /🔽ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa @164b bco brgyad zab / ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab /
translated: How are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha profound?🔽How is the result of stream enterer profound?

original: ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab /
translated: How is the result of once-returner profound?

original: ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab /
translated: How is the result of non-returner profound?

original: ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid zab; ji ltar na rang byang chub zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid zab; ji ltar na rang byang chub zab /
translated: How is the state of a worthy one profound? How is a pratyekabuddha’s awakening profound?

original: ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab /
analyzed: ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab /
translated: How is the knowledge of path aspects profound?

original: ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab ce na /
translated: How is the knowledge of all aspects profound?”

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo //
translated: “Form is as profound as the suchness of form.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba zab bo //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba zab bo //
translated: Feeling is as profound as the suchness of feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du shes zab bo //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du shes zab bo //
translated: Perception is profound just as the suchness of perception is.🔽Formations are profound just as the suchness of formations is.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du byed zab bo; ;rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zab bo //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du byed zab bo; ;rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zab bo //
translated: Consciousness is profound just as the suchness of consciousness is.

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig zab bo //
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig zab bo //
translated: The eyes are profound just as the suchness of the eyes is.

original: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba zab bo //🔽sna'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna zab bo //
analyzed: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba zab bo // sna'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna zab bo //
translated: The ears are profound just as the suchness of the ears is.🔽The nose is profound just as the suchness of the nose is.

original: lce'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce zab bo //
analyzed: lce'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce zab bo //
translated: The tongue is profound just as the suchness of the tongue is.

original: lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus zab bo //
analyzed: lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus zab bo //
translated: The body is profound just as the suchness of the body is.

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid zab bo //
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid zab bo //
translated: The mind is profound just as the suchness of the mind is.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo //
translated: Form is profound just as the suchness of form is.

original: sgra'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra zab bo //
analyzed: sgra'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra zab bo //
translated: Sound is profound just as the suchness of sound is.

original: dri'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dri zab bo //🔽ro'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ro zab bo //
analyzed: dri'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dri zab bo // ro'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ro zab bo //
translated: The suchness of smell is just as it is, and smell is profound.🔽The suchness of taste is just as it is, and taste is profound.

original: reg gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du reg zab bo //
analyzed: reg gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du reg zab bo //
translated: The suchness of touch is just as it is, and touch is profound.

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chos zab bo //🔽mig gi rnam par shes @165a *//
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chos zab bo // mig gi rnam par shes @165a *//
translated: The suchness of mental phenomena is just as it is, and mental phenomena are profound.

original: pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa zab bo //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab bo //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa zab bo //
analyzed: pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa zab bo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab bo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of eye consciousness is just as it is, and eye consciousness is profound.🔽The suchness of ear consciousness is just as it is, and ear consciousness is profound.🔽The suchness of nose consciousness is just as it is, and nose consciousness is profound.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa zab bo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of tongue consciousness is just as it is, and tongue consciousness is profound.🔽The suchness of body consciousness is just as it is, and body consciousness is profound.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab bo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the consciousness of the body is just as it is, and so the consciousness of the body is profound.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab bo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the mental consciousness is just as it is, and so the mental consciousness is profound.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness is just as it is, and so the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness is profound.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the contact that is the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness is just as it is, and so the contact that is the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness is profound.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the contact that is the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness is just as it is, and so the contact that is the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness is profound.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the contact that is the coming together of tongue, taste, and consciousness is just as it is, and so the contact that is the coming together of tongue, taste, and consciousness is profound.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the contact that is the coming together of body, touch, and consciousness is just as it is, and so the contact that is the coming together of body, touch, and consciousness is profound.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the mind’s contact is just as profound as the mind’s contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is just as profound as the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna @165b ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
analyzed: rna @165b ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is just as profound as the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is just as profound as the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.🔽The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is just as profound as the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by way of the body is just like the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by way of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by way of the mind is just like the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by way of the mind.

original: sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sa'i khams zab bo //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sa'i khams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the earth element is just like the suchness of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chu'i khams zab bo //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chu'i khams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the water element is just like the suchness of the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du me'i khams zab bo //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du me'i khams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the fire element is just like the suchness of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rlung gi khams zab bo /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rlung gi khams zab bo /
translated: The suchness of the wind element is just like the suchness of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams zab bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the space element is just like the suchness of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams zab bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the consciousness element is just as it is, and so the consciousness element is profound.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ma rig pa zab bo //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ma rig pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of ignorance is just as it is, and so ignorance is profound.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du byed zab bo //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du byed zab bo //
translated: The suchness of volitional factors is just as it is, and so volitional factors are profound.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam @166a *//🔽par shes pa zab bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam @166a *// par shes pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of consciousness is just as it is, and so consciousness is profound.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ming dang gzugs zab bo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ming dang gzugs zab bo //
translated: The suchness of name-and-form is just as it is, and so name-and-form is profound.

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched drug zab bo //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched drug zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the six sense spheres is just as it is, and so the six sense spheres are profound.

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du reg pa zab bo //
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du reg pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of contact is just as it is, and so contact is profound.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba zab bo //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba zab bo //
translated: The suchness of feeling is just as it is, and so feeling is profound.

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sred pa zab bo //
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sred pa zab bo //
translated: The suchness of craving is just as it is, and so craving is profound.

original: len pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du len pa zab bo //
analyzed: len pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du len pa zab bo //
translated: Appropriation is profound just as the suchness of appropriation is.

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du srid pa zab bo //
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du srid pa zab bo //
translated: Existence is profound just as the suchness of existence is.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du skye ba zab bo //
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du skye ba zab bo //
translated: Birth is profound just as the suchness of birth is.

original: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rga shi zab bo //
analyzed: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rga shi zab bo //
translated: Aging and death are profound just as the suchness of aging and death is.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of generosity is profound just as the suchness of the perfection of generosity is.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is profound just as the suchness of the perfection of moral discipline is.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of patience is profound just as the suchness of the perfection of patience is.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is deep just as the suchness of the perfection of perseverance is.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of concentration is deep just as the suchness of the perfection of concentration is.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi de @166b bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid zab bo //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo // nang stong pa nyid kyi de @166b bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid zab bo // phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is deep just as the suchness of the perfection of wisdom is.🔽Inner emptiness is deep just as the suchness of inner emptiness is.🔽Outer emptiness is deep just as the suchness of outer emptiness is.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is deep just as the suchness of inner and outer emptiness is.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of emptiness is just as it is, and so the emptiness of emptiness is profound.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of great extent is just as it is, and so the emptiness of great extent is profound.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of ultimate reality is just as it is, and so the emptiness of ultimate reality is profound.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is just as it is, and so the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is profound.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is just as it is, and so the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is profound.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the unlimited is just as it is, and so the emptiness of the unlimited is profound.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of no beginning or end is just as profound as the emptiness of no beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is just as profound as the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of nature is just as profound as the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is just as profound as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab @167a *//
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab @167a *//
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of specific characteristics is just as profound as the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: bo; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: bo; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is just as profound as the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is just as it is, and the emptiness of non-apprehension is profound just as it is.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of essential nature is just as it is, and the emptiness of essential nature is profound just as it is.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is just as it is, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is profound just as it is.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is just as it is, and the applications of mindfulness are profound just as they are.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams zab bo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the right efforts is just as it is, and the right efforts are profound just as they are.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the bases of supernatural power is just as it is, and the bases of supernatural power are profound just as they are.

original: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dbang po rnams zab bo //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dbang po rnams zab bo //
translated: The faculties are as deep as the suchness of the faculties.🔽The powers are as deep as the suchness of the powers.

original: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stobs rnams zab bo; ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab bo //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stobs rnams zab bo; ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab bo //
translated: The limbs of awakening are as deep as the suchness of the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab bo //
translated: The noble eightfold path is as deep as the suchness of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The truths are as deep as the suchness of the truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams @167b kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams zab bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams @167b kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams zab bo //
translated: The concentrations are as deep as the suchness of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshad med pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshad med pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The immeasurables are as deep as the suchness of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The formless concentrations are profound just as the suchness of the formless concentrations is.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The liberations are profound just as the suchness of the liberations is.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab bo //🔽stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab bo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du /
translated: The serial absorptions are profound just as the suchness of the serial absorptions is.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zab bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zab bo //
translated: Emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are profound just as the suchness of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness is.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The superknowledges are profound just as the suchness of the superknowledges is.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams zab bo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams zab bo //
translated: The meditative stabilities are as deep as the suchness of the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab bo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab bo //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are as deep as the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab bo //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are as deep as the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The fearlessnesses are as deep as the suchness of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are as deep as the suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams @168a *// pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byams pa chen po zab bo //
analyzed: byams @168a *// pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byams pa chen po zab bo //
translated: Great love is as deep as the suchness of great love.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po zab bo; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab bo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po zab bo; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the great compassion is just as it is, and the great compassion is profound. The suchness of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha is just as it is, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha are profound.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab bo //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the fruit of entering the stream is just as it is, and the fruit of entering the stream is profound.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab bo //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is just as it is, and the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is profound.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab bo //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is just as it is, and the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is profound.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of arhatship is just as it is, and arhatship is profound.

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang byang chub zab bo //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang byang chub zab bo //
translated: “The suchness of a pratyekabuddha is deep.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of path aspects is deep.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab bo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab bo //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is deep.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is the suchness of form?

original: bcom ldan 'das; tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: Lord, what is the suchness of feeling?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is the suchness of perception?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is the suchness of volitional factors?

analyzed: @168b bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /

translated: Lord,

analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: What is the suchness of the fruit of non-returning?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is the suchness of arhatship?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is the suchness of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang med /
translated: “Subhūti, in the suchness of form, there is no form,

original: gzugs las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from form, there is no suchness.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of form.

original: rab 'byor / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la tshor ba'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la tshor ba'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of feeling, there is no feeling,

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from feeling, there is no suchness.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of feeling.

original: rab 'byor / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du shes kyang med /🔽'du shes las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du shes kyang med / 'du shes las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhuti: The Suchness of perception is not perception,🔽nor is Suchness anything other than perception.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of perception is not perception,

original: rab 'byor / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du byed kyang med /🔽'du byed las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du byed kyang med / 'du byed las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhuti: The Suchness of the will-body is not the will-body,🔽nor is Suchness anything other than the will-body.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta @172a *//
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta @172a *//
translated: The Suchness of the will-body is not the will-body,

original: bu'o; ;rab 'byor /🔽rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: bu'o; ;rab 'byor / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par shes pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti: The Suchness of consciousness is not consciousness,🔽nor is Suchness anything other than consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /🔽rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of consciousness is not consciousness,

original: rab 'byor / mig gi de bzhin nyid de la mig kyang med /🔽mig las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi de bzhin nyid de la mig kyang med / mig las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhuti: The Suchness of the eye is not the eye,🔽nor is Suchness anything other than the eye.

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the eye is not the eye,

original: rab 'byor / rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'ang med /
translated: Subhuti: The Suchness of the ear is not the ear,

original: rna ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rna ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the ear.

original: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / sna'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'ang med /
analyzed: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / sna'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'ang med /
translated: The suchness of the ear is like that.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the nose there is no nose.

original: sna las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: sna las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the nose.

original: sna'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / lce'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'ang med /
analyzed: sna'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / lce'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'ang med /
translated: The suchness of the nose is like that.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the tongue there is no tongue.

original: lce las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lce las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the tongue.

original: lce'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / lus kyi de bzhin nyid de la lus kyang med /
analyzed: lce'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / lus kyi de bzhin nyid de la lus kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the tongue is like that.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the body there is no body.

original: lus las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lus las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the body.

original: lus kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / yid kyi de bzhin nyid de la yid kyang med /
analyzed: lus kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / yid kyi de bzhin nyid de la yid kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the body is like that.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the mind there is no mind.

original: yid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: yid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the mind.

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the mind is like that.

original: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of form there is no form.

original: gzugs las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of form is not other than form.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / sgra'i de bzhin nyid de la sgra'ang med /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / sgra'i de bzhin nyid de la sgra'ang med /
translated: The suchness of form is like that.🔽Subhūti, that suchness of sound is not sound.

original: sgra las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: sgra las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of sound is not other than sound.

original: sgra'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / dri'i de bzhin nyid de @172b la dri'ang med /
analyzed: sgra'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / dri'i de bzhin nyid de @172b la dri'ang med /
translated: The suchness of sound is like that.🔽Subhūti, that suchness of smell is not smell.

original: dri las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: dri las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of smell is not other than smell.

original: dri de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / ro'i de bzhin nyid de la ro'ang med /
analyzed: dri de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / ro'i de bzhin nyid de la ro'ang med /
translated: The suchness of smell is like that.🔽Subhūti, that suchness of taste is not taste.

original: ro las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: ro las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of taste is not other than taste.

original: ro'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / reg gi de bzhin nyid de la reg kyang med /
analyzed: ro'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / reg gi de bzhin nyid de la reg kyang med /
translated: The suchness of taste is like that.🔽Subhūti, that suchness of touch is not touch.

original: reg las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: reg las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of touch is not other than touch.

original: reg gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: reg gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of touch is like that.

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la chos kyang med; chos las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la chos kyang med; chos las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhuti, in that thusness of dharmas there are no dharmas, and apart from dharmas there is no thusness.

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti, in that thusness of eye-consciousness there is no eye-consciousness,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from eye-consciousness there is no thusness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of eye-consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti, in that thusness of ear-consciousness there is no ear-consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from ear-consciousness there is no thusness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of ear-consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti, in that thusness of nose-consciousness there is no nose-consciousness,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Also, suchness does not exist apart from olfactory consciousness.🔽

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: the suchness of the nose consciousness is not other than the nose consciousness,🔽and the suchness of the nose consciousness is not other than that.

original: rab 'byor / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the nose consciousness, there is no nose consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and the suchness of the nose consciousness is not other than that.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the tongue consciousness, there is no tongue consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la @173a *//
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la @173a *//
translated: and the suchness of the tongue consciousness is not other than that.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang med /🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang med / lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the body consciousness, there is no body consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: and the suchness of the body consciousness is not other than that.

original: rab 'byor / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the thinking-mind consciousness, there is no thinking-mind consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and the suchness of the thinking-mind consciousness is not other than that.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the mental consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, that thusness of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness is not the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness, there is no thusness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, that thusness of the contact that is the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness is not the contact that is the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the contact that is the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness, there is no thusness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the contact that is the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, that thusness of the contact that is the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness is not the contact that is the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the contact that is the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness, there is no thusness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the contact that is the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti, in the thusness of the contact of the tongue there is no contact of the tongue,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the contact of the tongue there is no thusness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The thusness of the contact of the tongue is like that.

original: rab 'byor / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti, in the thusness of the contact of the body there is no contact of the body,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang @173b de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang @173b de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the contact of the body there is no thusness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The thusness of the contact of the body is like that.

original: rab 'byor / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti, in the thusness of the contact of the mind there is no contact of the mind,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the contact of the mind there is no thusness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The thusness of the contact of the mind is like that.

original: rab 'byor / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the skandhas, elements, sense fields, etc.🔽The Suchness of the skandhas, elements, sense fields, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Buddha.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Buddha is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Bodhisattva.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Bodhisattva is the Suchness of the Tathagata.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Disciple.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Disciple is the Suchness of the Tathagata.

original: rab 'byor / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Buddha.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Buddha is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Bodhisattva.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Bodhisattva is the Suchness of the Tathagata.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Disciple.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Disciple

original: rab 'byor / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose, there is no feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose, there is no suchness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose is like that.

original: rab 'byor / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue, there is no feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen @174a *//
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen @174a *//
translated: Apart from the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue, there is no suchness.

original: gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue is like that.

original: rab 'byor / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med; lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med; lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the eye, etc.🔽The Suchness of the eye, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang med / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the skandhas, elements, sense fields, etc.🔽The Suchness of the skandhas, elements, sense fields, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the four establishments of mindfulness, etc.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the four establishments of mindfulness, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Buddha.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of a Buddha is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the perfection of giving, etc.🔽The Suchness of the perfection of giving, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the emptiness of the subject, etc.

original: rab 'byor / sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la sa'i khams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la sa'i khams kyang med /
translated: The Suchness of the emptiness of the subject, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the applications of mindfulness, etc.🔽The Suchness of the applications of mindfulness, etc. is the Suchness of the Tathagata.🔽The Suchness of the Tathagata is the Suchness of the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc.🔽The Suchness of the fruit of

original: sa'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /🔽sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de / sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: the suchness of the earth element is not other than the suchness of the water element.

original: rab 'byor / chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la chu'i khams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la chu'i khams kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the water element is not other than the suchness of the fire element.🔽The suchness of the fire element is not other than the suchness of the wind element.

original: chu'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: chu'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of the wind element is not other than the suchness of the space element.🔽The suchness of the space element is not other than the suchness of the consciousness element.🔽The suchness of the consciousness element is not other than the suchness of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la me'i khams kyang med /🔽me'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la me'i khams kyang med / me'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of the earth element is not other than the suchness of the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la rlung gi khams kyang med /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la rlung gi khams kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the water element is not other than the suchness of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of the fire element is not other than the suchness of the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / nam mkha'i khams kyi de @174b bzhin nyid de la /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / nam mkha'i khams kyi de @174b bzhin nyid de la /
translated: The suchness of the wind element is not other than the suchness of the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang med /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the space element is not other than the suchness of the consciousness element.🔽The suchness of the consciousness element is not other than the suchness of the form element.

original: nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang med /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the space element is just that suchness.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the consciousness element, there is no consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de la ma rig pa'ang med /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de la ma rig pa'ang med /
translated: The suchness of the consciousness element is just that suchness.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of ignorance, there is no ignorance.

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of ignorance is just that suchness.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of volitional factors, there are no volitional factors.

original: rab 'byor / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du byed kyang med; 'du byed las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du byed kyang med; 'du byed las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than volitional factors.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of volitional factors is just that suchness.

original: rab 'byor / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of consciousness, there is no consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang med /
translated: consciousness is not,

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from consciousness there is no suchness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of consciousness is like that.

original: rab 'byor / ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of name and form

original: ming dang gzugs kyang med /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang med /
translated: name and form are not,

original: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from name and form there is no suchness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of name and form is like that.

original: rab 'byor / skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid de la skye mched drug kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid de la skye mched drug kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the six sense fields the six sense fields are not,

original: skye mched drug las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: skye mched drug las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the six sense fields there is no suchness.

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the six sense fields is like that.

original: rab 'byor / reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la reg pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la reg pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of contact contact is not,

original: reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from contact there is no suchness.

original: reg @175a *// pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: reg @175a *// pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of contact is like that.

original: rab 'byor / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la tshor ba'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la tshor ba'ang med /
translated: The Suchness of form is not one thing, and the Suchness of consciousness another.🔽The Suchness of form is the Suchness of all dharmas, and the Suchness of all dharmas is the Suchness of form.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /🔽tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the eye is not one thing, and the Suchness of the ear another.

original: rab 'byor / sred pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sred pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sred pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sred pa'ang med /
translated: The Suchness of the eye is the Suchness of all dharmas, and the Suchness of all dharmas is the Suchness of the eye.

original: sred pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /🔽sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sred pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de / sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the ear is not one thing, and the Suchness of the nose another.

original: rab 'byor / len pa'i de bzhin nyid de la len pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / len pa'i de bzhin nyid de la len pa'ang med /
translated: The Suchness of the ear is the Suchness of all dharmas, and the Suchness of all dharmas is the Suchness of the ear.

original: len pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: len pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The Suchness of the nose is not one thing, and the Suchness of the tongue another.

original: len pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: len pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the nose is the Suchness of all dharmas, and the Suchness of all dharmas is the Suchness of the nose.

original: rab 'byor / srid pa'i de bzhin nyid de la srid pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / srid pa'i de bzhin nyid de la srid pa'ang med /
