translated: The Suchness of the tongue is not one thing, and the Suchness of the body another.🔽The Suchness of the tongue is the Suchness of all dharmas, and the Suchness of all dharmas is the Suchness of the tongue.

original: srid pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: srid pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The Suchness of the body is not one thing, and the Suchness of the mind another.

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / skye ba'i de bzhin nyid de la skye ba'ang med /
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / skye ba'i de bzhin nyid de la skye ba'ang med /
translated: The Suchness of the body is the Suchness of all dharmas, and the Suchness of all dharmas is the Suchness of the body.

original: skye ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: skye ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The Suchness of the mind is not one thing, and the Suchness of form another.🔽The Suchness of the mind is the Suchness of all dharmas, and the Suchness of all dharmas is the Suchness of the mind.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of birth.

original: rab 'byor / rga shi'i de bzhin nyid de la rga shi'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rga shi'i de bzhin nyid de la rga shi'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thusness of old age and death, there is no old age and death;

original: rga shi las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rga shi las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: apart from old age and death, there is no thusness;

original: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: the thusness of old age and death is like that.

original: rab 'byor; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the thusness of the perfection of giving, there is no perfection of giving;

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: apart from the perfection of giving, there is no thusness;

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: the thusness of the perfection of giving is like that.

original: rab 'byor / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la /
translated: Subhūti, in the thusness of the perfection of morality,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
translated: there is no perfection of morality;

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin @175b pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin @175b pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: apart from the perfection of morality, there is no thusness;

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: the thusness of the perfection of morality is like that.

original: rab 'byor / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la /
translated: Subhuti, in the suchness of the perfection of patience

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med; bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med; bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: there is no perfection of patience, and apart from the perfection of patience there is no suchness.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
translated: Such is the suchness of the perfection of patience.🔽Subhuti, in the suchness of the perfection of vigor

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: there is no perfection of vigor, and apart from the perfection of vigor there is no suchness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
translated: Such is the suchness of the perfection of vigor.🔽Subhuti, in the suchness of the perfection of concentration

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: there is no perfection of concentration, and apart from the perfection of concentration there is no suchness.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the perfection of concentration.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thusness of the perfection of wisdom there is no perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the perfection of wisdom there is no thusness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la nang stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la nang stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thusness of inner emptiness there is no inner emptiness,

original: nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from inner emptiness there is no thusness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la phyi stong pa nyid kyang @176a *//
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la phyi stong pa nyid kyang @176a *//
translated: Such is the thusness of inner emptiness.🔽Subhūti, in that thusness of outer emptiness there is no outer emptiness,

original: med; phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: med; phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from outer emptiness there is no thusness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of external emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of the inner and the outer, the inner and the outer are not found.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the inner and the outer, suchness is not found.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the emptiness of the inner and the outer.

original: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is not found.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of emptiness, suchness is not found.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Such is the suchness of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of the great,🔽the great is not found.

original: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the great, suchness is not found.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the emptiness of the great.

original: rab 'byor / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of the ultimate does not exist.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the ultimate, suchness does not exist.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: rab 'byor / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the conditioned does not exist.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the conditioned, suchness does not exist.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Such is the suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned does not exist.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the unconditioned, suchness does not exist.

original: 'dus ma byas @176b stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas @176b stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: rab 'byor / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the thusness of the emptiness of what transcends limits, there are no limits,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the emptiness of what transcends limits, there is no thusness.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽Subhūti, in the thusness of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, there is no beginning or end,

original: rab 'byor / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang med; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang med; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, there is no thusness.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.🔽Subhūti, in the thusness of the emptiness of nonrepudiation, there is no nonrepudiation,

original: rab 'byor / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: and apart from the emptiness of nonrepudiation, there is no thusness.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of nonrejection is thus.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the emptiness of nature there is no emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of nature is thus.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena there are no all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is thus.

original: rab 'byor / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the emptiness of its own mark there is no emptiness of its own mark.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud @177a *//🔽na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud @177a *// na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Suchness is not other than the emptiness of its own mark.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of its own mark is just like that.

original: rab 'byor / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang med /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang med / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension there is no emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽and suchness is not other than the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is just like that.

original: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang med /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang med / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the emptiness of non-things there is no emptiness of non-things,🔽and suchness is not other than the emptiness of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-things is just like that.

original: rab 'byor / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of essential nature does not exist.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of essential nature, suchness does not exist.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is like that.

original: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities does not exist.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, suchness does not exist.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is like that.🔽Subhūti, in the suchness of the applications of mindfulness, the applications of mindfulness do not exist.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the applications of mindfulness, suchness does not exist.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thatness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: rab 'byor / yang dag @177b par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid de la yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / yang dag @177b par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid de la yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thatness of the right efforts the right efforts are not there,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the right efforts thatness is not there either.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thatness of the right efforts.

original: rab 'byor / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thatness of the legs of miraculous power the legs of miraculous power are not there,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the legs of miraculous power thatness is not there either.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thatness of the legs of miraculous power.

original: rab 'byor / dbang po'i de bzhin nyid de la dbang po rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dbang po'i de bzhin nyid de la dbang po rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thatness of the faculties the faculties are not there,

original: dbang po rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: dbang po rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the faculties thatness is not there either.

original: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thatness of the faculties.

original: rab 'byor / stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de la stobs rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de la stobs rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the powers the powers are not there,

original: stobs rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: stobs rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the powers suchness is not there.

original: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the powers.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the limbs of awakening the limbs of awakening are not there,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the limbs of awakening suchness is not there.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the limbs of awakening.

original: rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the noble eightfold path the noble eightfold path is not there,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the noble eightfold path suchness is not there.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the noble eightfold path.

original: @178a *// rab 'byor /
analyzed: @178a *// rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang med /
translated: In the suchness of the noble truths, the noble truths are also not found.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the noble truths, suchness is not found.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the noble truths.

original: rab 'byor / bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid de la /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the meditative stabilizations,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang med /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang med /
translated: the meditative stabilizations are not found.

original: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the meditative stabilizations, suchness is not found.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the meditative stabilizations.

original: rab 'byor / tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la tshad med pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la tshad med pa rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the immeasurable ones, the immeasurable ones are not found.

original: tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the immeasurable ones, suchness is not found.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the immeasurable ones.

original: rab 'byor / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of the formless absorptions, the formless absorptions are not found.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of the formless absorptions is not other than the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the formless absorptions is like that.

original: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the liberations, the liberations are not there,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and the suchness of the liberations is not other than the liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the liberations is like that.

original: rab 'byor / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de la /🔽mthar gyis @178b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de la / mthar gyis @178b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that suchness of the serial absorptions,🔽the serial absorptions are not there,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and the suchness of the serial absorptions is not other than the serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the serial absorptions is like that.

original: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyang med /
translated: Subhuti, the Suchness of the emptiness gate of liberation is not the emptiness gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the emptiness gate of liberation, there is no Suchness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the emptiness gate of liberation is like this.🔽Subhuti, the Suchness of the signless gate of liberation is not the signless gate of liberation.

original: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa'i sdo mtshan ma med pa'ang med; rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa'i sdo mtshan ma med pa'ang med; rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the signless gate of liberation, there is no Suchness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The Suchness of the signless gate of liberation is like this.

original: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'ang med /
translated: Subhuti, the Suchness of the wishless gate of liberation is not the wishless gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of essential nature is not other than the emptiness of essential nature.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not other than the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not other than the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all things is not the emptiness of all things.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all things is not other than the emptiness of all things.

original: rab 'byor / mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mngon par shes pa rnams kyang med /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mngon par shes pa rnams kyang med / mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not other than the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of essential nature is not other than the emptiness of essential nature.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not other than the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid de la ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang med /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid @179a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid de la ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang med / ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid @179a *//
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: med de / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: med de / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not other than the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all things is not the emptiness of all things.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of all things is not other than the emptiness of all things.

original: rab 'byor / gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang med /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang med /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not other than the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thusness of the tathāgatas’ powers the tathāgatas’ powers are not found,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the tathāgatas’ powers, thusness is not found.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the tathāgatas’ powers.

original: rab 'byor / mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang med /
translated: Subhūti, in that thusness of the fearlessnesses the fearlessnesses are not found,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the fearlessnesses, thusness is not found.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang med /
translated: Such is the thusness of the fearlessnesses.🔽Subhūti, in that thusness of the detailed and thorough knowledges the detailed and thorough knowledges are not found,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: and apart from the detailed and thorough knowledges, thusness is not found.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the suchness of the analytical knowledges.

original: rab 'byor / byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid de la byams pa chen po'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid de la byams pa chen po'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of great love, there is no great love;

original: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: apart from great love, there is no suchness;

original: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid de la snying rje chen po'ang med /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid de la snying rje chen po'ang med /
translated: the suchness of great love is just that.🔽Subhūti, in the suchness of great compassion, there is no great compassion;

original: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid @179b med de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid @179b med de /
translated: apart from great compassion, there is no suchness;

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang med /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang med /
translated: the suchness of great compassion is just that.🔽Subhūti, in the suchness of the distinct attributes of the buddhas, there are no distinct attributes of the buddhas;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: apart from the distinct attributes of the buddhas, there is no suchness;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the buddhadharmas.

original: rab 'byor / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the thusness of the result of stream enterer, the result of stream enterer does not exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the result of stream enterer, there is no thusness.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the result of stream enterer.

original: rab 'byor / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the thusness of the result of once-returner, the result of once-returner does not exist.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Apart from the result of once-returner, there is no thusness.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Such is the thusness of the result of once-returner.

original: rab 'byor / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang med /
translated: Subhūti, in the thusness of the result of non-returner, the result of non-returner does not exist.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Also, suchness is not other than the fruit of non-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dgra bcom pa nyid kyang med /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de la dgra bcom pa nyid kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the fruit of non-returning is just like that.🔽Subhūti, in that suchness of the state of a worthy one, there is no state of a worthy one.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Also, suchness is not other than the state of a worthy one.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //🔽rab 'byor / rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de la rang byang chub kyang med /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o // rab 'byor / rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de la rang byang chub kyang med /
translated: The suchness of the state of a worthy one is just like that.🔽Subhuti, in that suchness of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, there is no pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: rang byang chub las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /🔽rang byang chub kyi @180a *//
analyzed: rang byang chub las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de / rang byang chub kyi @180a *//
translated: Also, suchness is not other than a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o //
translated: The suchness of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is just like that.

original: rab 'byor / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang med; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang med; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid med de /
translated: Subhūti, in the suchness of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, there is no unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, and apart from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, there is no suchness.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o ////
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o ////
translated: Such is the suchness of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya so dgu pa /
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya so dgu pa /
translated: Chapter 99🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ltar thabs phra bas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: de ltar thabs phra bas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs las kyang bzlog /
translated: in this way, through subtle means, irreversible bodhisattva great beings are turned away from form

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
translated: and nirvāṇa is taught.

original: tshor ba las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: tshor ba las kyang bzlog /
translated: They are turned away from feeling

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
translated: and nirvāṇa is taught.

original: 'du shes las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: 'du shes las kyang bzlog /
translated: They are turned away from perception🔽and nirvāṇa is taught.🔽They are turned away from volitional factors

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
translated: and nirvāṇa is taught.

original: 'du byed las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: 'du byed las kyang bzlog /
translated: It is also the opposite of formation.🔽

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽rnam par shes pa las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / rnam par shes pa las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from formations and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽mig las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / mig las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from consciousness and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽rna ba las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / rna ba las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from the eyes and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽sna las kyang bzlog /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽lce las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / sna las kyang bzlog / mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / lce las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from the ears and also reveal nirvana.🔽They turn away from the nose and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽lus las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / lus las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from the tongue and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽yid las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / yid las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from the body and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽gzugs las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / gzugs las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from the mind and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽sgra las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan / sgra las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from forms and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las @180b 'das pa'ang bstan /🔽dri las kyang bzlog /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: mya ngan las @180b 'das pa'ang bstan / dri las kyang bzlog / mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
translated: They turn away from sounds and also reveal nirvana.🔽They turn away from smells and also reveal nirvana.

original: ro las kyang bzlog /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: ro las kyang bzlog / mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
translated: They turn away from tastes and also reveal nirvana.

original: reg las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: reg las kyang bzlog /
translated: They turn away from tactile objects and also reveal nirvana.🔽They turn away from mental phenomena and also reveal nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
translated: He taught nirvana.

original: chos las kyang bzlog /
analyzed: chos las kyang bzlog /
translated: He turned away from phenomena.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa las kyang bzlog /

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan /

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las kyang bzlog /

translated: They are turned away from all the attachments, mundane and supramundane, shared and unshared, tainted and untainted,🔽and nirvāṇa is taught.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan pa de ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang bstan pa de ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: That is amazing!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @183a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @183a *//
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: stsal pa / rab 'byor /
analyzed: stsal pa / rab 'byor /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bdag gis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bdag gis gnas par bya'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings should abide in accordance with the teachings in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad brjod pa bzhin du bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gnas zab mo 'di dag sems shing 'jal ba dang / rtog pa byed na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad brjod pa bzhin du bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gnas zab mo 'di dag sems shing 'jal ba dang / rtog pa byed na /
translated: I should train in accordance with what is said in the Perfection of Wisdom.”🔽Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings think about, contemplate, and investigate these profound topics associated with the perfection of wisdom,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin du sems pa dang / de bzhin du yongs su rtog pa dang / de bzhin du brtson par byed pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin du sems pa dang / de bzhin du yongs su rtog pa dang / de bzhin du brtson par byed pa dang /
translated: and if they practice in accordance with what is said in the Perfection of Wisdom, think in accordance with it, fully investigate in accordance with it, strive in accordance with it,

original: de bzhin du rtsol ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du 'bad pa de ni sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsol ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du 'bad pa de ni sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: and exert themselves in accordance with what is taught in the Perfection of Wisdom, then through a single thought of awakening they will embrace roots of virtue that are incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless.

original: de bskal pa tshad med par 'khor ba spong par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de bskal pa tshad med par 'khor ba spong par 'gyur na /
translated: They will abandon saṃsāra for immeasurable eons.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma 'dres par spyod cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma 'dres par spyod cing /
translated: So what need is there to speak of those who practice the perfection of wisdom unmixed with other practices,

original: byang chub yid la bya ba dang ldan par gnas pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: byang chub yid la bya ba dang ldan par gnas pa lta ci smos /
translated: and who abide with the thought of awakening in mind?

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / skyes bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rtog pa dang ldan pa la la zhig gis /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rtog pa dang ldan pa la la zhig gis /
translated: Suppose some man with a lustful nature and thoughts of desire

original: bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig btus la /
analyzed: bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig btus la /
translated: were to find a woman who is well proportioned, attractive, and beautiful to behold.

original: bud med de gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba zhig ste /
analyzed: bud med de gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba zhig ste /
translated: But that woman is owned by someone else,

original: khyim nas phyir 'byung bar ma nus na /
analyzed: khyim nas phyir 'byung bar ma nus na /
translated: and he is unable to leave his home.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti?

original: skyes bu de'i rtog pa ci dang ldan par @183b 'gyur /
analyzed: skyes bu de'i rtog pa ci dang ldan par @183b 'gyur /
translated: What kind of thoughts will that man have?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” He replied, “Blessed One,

original: skyes bu de'i rtog pa ni /
analyzed: skyes bu de'i rtog pa ni /
translated: the thoughts of that man

original: bud med dang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bud med dang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: will be of that woman.

original: bdag gi bud med de ni 'di lta bu zhig go /
analyzed: bdag gi bud med de ni 'di lta bu zhig go /
translated: ‘My woman is like this.

original: de 'ongs nas de dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de 'ongs nas de dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o //
translated: When she comes, I will stay with her.🔽’

original: brtse bar bya'o snyam mo //
analyzed: brtse bar bya'o snyam mo //
translated: I will have compassion for them.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Subhūti?

original: nyin mtshan 'das pas skyes bu de'i rtog pa ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: nyin mtshan 'das pas skyes bu de'i rtog pa ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: How many thoughts would arise in that person during the passing of a day and night?”🔽He replied,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ni med do //
analyzed: de ni med do //
translated: there are many.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Blessed One, Sugata,

original: de ni mang ste /
analyzed: de ni mang ste /
translated: there are many.

original: skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa de'i nyin mtshan 'das pas shin tu mang par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa de'i nyin mtshan 'das pas shin tu mang par 'byung ngo //
translated: During the passing of a day and night, the thoughts of that person would arise in great number.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa nyin mtshan 'das pas ji snyed cig 'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba spong zhing rgyab kyis bltas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa nyin mtshan 'das pas ji snyed cig 'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba spong zhing rgyab kyis bltas par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being would abandon saṃsāra and turn away from it for as many eons as the thoughts that arise in that person during the passing of a day and night.

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la slob pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / sems pa dang / nyes pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la slob pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / sems pa dang / nyes pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Those who train in this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught, who investigate it, who contemplate it, and who understand it as it is, will quickly awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i nyes pa de dag ci nas kyang spangs par 'gyur ba de ltar brtson par byed na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i nyes pa de dag ci nas kyang spangs par 'gyur ba de ltar brtson par byed na /
translated: Those who train in this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught, who investigate it, who contemplate it, and who strive to abandon the faults by which bodhisattva great beings turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽they will strive in that way.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar brtson pas rjes su brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas pa des nyin gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yongs su bzung ba des /🔽gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten @184a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar brtson pas rjes su brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas pa des nyin gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yongs su bzung ba des / gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten @184a *//
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who strive in that way, who strive in accordance with it, who stand in the perfection of wisdom as it has been taught, will, in one day, take hold of wholesome roots

original: gyi khams rnams yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /
analyzed: gyi khams rnams yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /
translated: that would fill as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River.

original: des ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i lhag ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: des ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i lhag ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: That would not even be a hundredth part of the remainder of that wholesome root.

original: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It would not even be a thousandth part, or a hundred thousandth part, or a ten millionth part,

original: bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: or a thousand millionth part, or a ten thousand millionth part, or a million millionth part, or a hundred thousand millionth part, or a million million billionth part of the remainder of that wholesome root.

original: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang; dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang; dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It would not even be a calculable, measurable, countable, comparable, or analogical part of the remainder of that wholesome root.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum la sbyin pa byin na /
analyzed: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum la sbyin pa byin na /
translated: give gifts to the Three Jewels—the Buddha Jewel, the Dharma Jewel, and the Saṅgha Jewel—for as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: If a bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: were to increase his merit through that cause, would he generate a lot of merit?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Bhagavān,🔽it would be a lot.

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /🔽mang ste / tshad ma mchis /🔽grangs ma mchis /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa / mang ste / tshad ma mchis / grangs ma mchis /
translated: Sugata,🔽it would be immeasurable,🔽uncountable,

original: dpag tu ma mchis /
analyzed: dpag tu ma mchis /
translated: incalculable,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab /
translated: inconceivable,

original: mtshungs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and incomparable.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

original: rab 'byor / de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: “Subhūti, a bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la brtson par byed na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la brtson par byed na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: who strives in this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught will generate even more merit than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: @184b tshul gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul lo //
analyzed: @184b tshul gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul lo //
translated: The method by which they will attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is the method of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba /
translated: if a bodhisattva mahāsattva, separated from the perfection of wisdom,

original: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par 'dug cing /
analyzed: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par 'dug cing /
translated: were to remain for as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa la yon phul /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa la yon phul /
translated: and were to offer gifts to stream-enterers,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yan phul na /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yan phul na /
translated: once-returners, non-returners, arhats, pratyekabuddhas, and tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: would that bodhisattva mahāsattva’s merit from that cause be much?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo; ;bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo; ;bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: it would be much, Sugata.

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: It would be much.” The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, if a bodhisattva mahāsattva were to remain for as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River, separated from the perfection of wisdom, and were to offer gifts to stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners, arhats, pratyekabuddhas, and tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas,

original: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad bstan pa 'di la brtson par byed na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad bstan pa 'di la brtson par byed na /
translated: Subhuti, a son or daughter of good family who strives in this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught will produce even more merit.

original: de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: Subhūti, a son of good lineage or a daughter of good lineage who exerts herself in this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught will have even more merit than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas /
translated: A bodhisattva great being who practices this perfection of wisdom, having transcended the level of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs //
translated: enters into the secure state of a bodhisattva

original: @185a *// par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @185a *// par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba zhig bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing 'tsho ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba zhig bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing 'tsho ste /
translated: If a bodhisattva great being who is separated from the perfection of wisdom were to sit and live for as many eons as there are sands in the Ganges river,

original: sbyin pa byin /
analyzed: sbyin pa byin /
translated: They give gifts,

original: tshul khrims bsrungs /🔽bzod pa bsgrubs /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrungs / bzod pa bsgrubs /
translated: they guard morality,🔽they cultivate patience,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams /
translated: they make an effort at perseverance,

original: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag /
analyzed: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag /
translated: they become absorbed in meditative concentration,

original: shes rab bsgoms na /
analyzed: shes rab bsgoms na /
translated: and they cultivate wisdom.

original: de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: Would the merit from that be a lot?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: it would be a lot, Sugata.🔽It would be a lot.”

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te /
translated: a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who, standing in this perfection of wisdom,

original: nyi ma 'ga' zhig sbyin pa byin pa dang // tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: nyi ma 'ga' zhig sbyin pa byin pa dang // tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: gives gifts for a few days, guards morality, cultivates patience, makes an effort at perseverance, becomes absorbed in meditative concentration, and cultivates wisdom would have a lot more merit than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is because

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is the mother of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of non-entities’ essential nature, the perfection of giving, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four kinds of exact knowledge, the four summaries of the Dharma, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, great compassion, and the thirty-two major marks of a great being.
