original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
translated: Subhūti, therefore sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: should be skilled in the perfection of wisdom dedication.”🔽“Subhūti, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who, having stood in this deep perfection of wisdom as it has been taught,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni yongs su brtag pa'i zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni yongs su brtag pa'i zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na /
translated: if the Blessed One has said that the non-performance of action is the investigation of the perfection of wisdom,

original: de la ji ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: de la ji ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags /
translated: how can the merit of that son of a good family or daughter of a good family increase greatly?”

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pas ni yang dag par lta ba bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pas ni yang dag par lta ba bskyed pa'am /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Blessed One,🔽through the non-performance of action, it is not possible to generate the correct view

original: skyon ma mchis par yang 'jug par mi nus so //
analyzed: skyon ma mchis par yang 'jug par mi nus so //
translated: or to enter into faultlessness.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
translated: It is not possible to attain the fruit of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'am /
translated: attain the state of a worthy one,

original: @188b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so /
analyzed: @188b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so /
translated: or fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just so, Subhūti.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pas ni /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pas ni /
translated: Through the absence of conditioning

original: yang dag par lta ba bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: yang dag par lta ba bskyed pa'am /
translated: one cannot generate the correct view,

original: skyon med par 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: skyon med par 'jug pa'am /
translated: enter into flawlessness,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'am /
translated: attain the state of a worthy one,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus te /
translated: or fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa de'ang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ste /🔽stong pa nyid du snang ngo //🔽gsob nyid du snang ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa de'ang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ste / stong pa nyid du snang ngo // gsob nyid du snang ngo //
translated: Subhūti, in that regard, the generosity of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom is also unconditioned,🔽appearing as emptiness,🔽appearing as hollow,

original: gsog nyid du snang ngo //
analyzed: gsog nyid du snang ngo //
translated: appearing as void,

original: snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo //
analyzed: snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo //
translated: and appearing as insubstantial.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because bodhisattva great beings

original: nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: have trained well in inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: have trained well in outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: have trained well in inner and outer emptiness, have trained well in the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa @189a *//
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa @189a *//
translated: have trained well in great emptiness,🔽have trained well in ultimate emptiness,

original: nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: have trained well in conditioned emptiness,🔽have trained well in unconditioned emptiness,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: have trained well in the emptiness of what is beyond limits,🔽have trained well in the emptiness of no beginning and no end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: have trained well in the emptiness of nonrepudiation,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: have trained well in the emptiness of a basic nature,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: they are well trained in the emptiness of all phenomena;

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: they are well trained in the emptiness of its own mark;🔽they are well trained in the emptiness of nonapprehension;

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: they are well trained in the emptiness of nonthings;🔽they are well trained in the emptiness of essential nature;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o //
translated: they are well trained in the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni stong pa nyid de dag la gnas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni stong pa nyid de dag la gnas shing /
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings, standing in those kinds of emptiness,

original: ji lta ji ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de dag la rab tu rtog pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de dag la rab tu rtog pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur te /
translated: to that extent bodhisattva great beings are not separated from the perfection of wisdom, to that extent they are skilled in discerning the nonproduction of all phenomena.

original: ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: To that extent, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de lta de ltar grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'i bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de lta de ltar grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'i bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “To that extent, to that extent will the merit of those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom increase, incalculable, immeasurable, and incomparable.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: grangs ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / tshad @189b ma mchis pa la bye brag ni ci mchis /🔽khyad par ni ci mchis /
analyzed: grangs ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / tshad @189b ma mchis pa la bye brag ni ci mchis / khyad par ni ci mchis /
translated: what is the difference between incalculable, immeasurable, and incomparable?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / gangs med pa zhes bya ba ni gang 'dus byas kyi khams sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / gangs med pa zhes bya ba ni gang 'dus byas kyi khams sam /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams su bgrang bar nye bar mi 'gro ba'o //🔽rab 'byor / dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams su bgrang bar nye bar mi 'gro ba'o // rab 'byor / dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: incalculable means it does not approach being counted in the compounded element or the uncompounded element.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la tshad mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la tshad mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, immeasurable means no measure of past, future, and present dharmas can be apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni gang gzhal bar mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni gang gzhal bar mi nus pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, incomparable means it cannot be weighed.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: rnam grangs gang gis gzugs kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam /
analyzed: rnam grangs gang gis gzugs kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam /
translated: Is there a way of enumerating form so that it becomes incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless?

original: tshor ba'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu me mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu me mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Is there a way of enumerating feeling so that it becomes incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless? Is there a way of enumerating perception so that it becomes incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless? Is there a way of enumerating formation so that it becomes incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless?

original: rnam par shes pa'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam /
translated: Is there a way of enumerating consciousness so that it becomes incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,🔽“Subhūti, there is a way of enumerating form so that it becomes incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs gang gis gzugs kyang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba'ang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes kyang grangs med @190a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs gang gis gzugs kyang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba'ang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes kyang grangs med @190a *//
translated: Subhūti, there is such a way that form is also incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless,

original: dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed kyang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'ang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu yod do //
analyzed: dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed kyang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'ang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu yod do //
translated: and that feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are also incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: rnam grangs gang gis na gzugs kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /🔽tshor ba'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: rnam grangs gang gis na gzugs kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags / tshor ba'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: by what way is form also incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless?🔽Is feeling also incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless?

original: 'du shes kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: Is perception also incalculable, immeasurable, and limitless?

original: 'du byed kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: also formations would be incalculable, beyond measure, and limitless.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: Also consciousness would be incalculable, beyond measure, and limitless.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / gzugs kyang stong pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs kyang stong pa ste /
translated: “Subhūti, form is also empty,

original: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
translated: incalculable, beyond measure, and limitless.

original: tshor ba'ang stong pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang stong pa ste /
translated: Feeling is also empty,

original: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
translated: incalculable, beyond measure, and limitless.

original: 'du shes kyang stong pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang stong pa ste /
translated: Perception is also empty,

original: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
translated: incalculable, beyond measure, and limitless.

original: 'du byed kyang stong pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang stong pa ste /
translated: Also formations are empty,

original: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
translated: incalculable, beyond measure, and limitless.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang stong pa ste /
translated: Also consciousness is empty,

original: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o //
translated: incalculable, beyond measure, and limitless.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: @190b gzugs 'ba' zhig stong /🔽tshor ba 'ba' zhig stong /
analyzed: @190b gzugs 'ba' zhig stong / tshor ba 'ba' zhig stong /
translated: is form alone empty,🔽is feeling alone empty,

original: 'du shes 'ba' zhig stong /
analyzed: 'du shes 'ba' zhig stong /
translated: is perception alone empty,

original: 'du byed 'ba' zhig stong /
analyzed: 'du byed 'ba' zhig stong /
translated: are formations alone empty,

original: rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig stong du bos kyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig stong du bos kyi /
translated: Consciousness is the only one that is not mentioned as empty.

original: ci chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ci chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: But the Blessed One has said that all phenomena are empty.

original: stong pa ma legs sam /
analyzed: stong pa ma legs sam /
translated: Is that not so?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: ngas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ma bshad dam; gsol pa /
analyzed: ngas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ma bshad dam; gsol pa /
translated: Have I not taught that all phenomena are empty?”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: the Thus-Gone One has taught that all phenomena are empty.

original: stong pa nyid gang lags pa de ni mi zad pa ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang lags pa de ni mi zad pa ste /
translated: Emptiness is inexhaustible.

original: grangs ma mchis pa'ang de legs /🔽dpag tu ma mchis pa'ang de lags /
analyzed: grangs ma mchis pa'ang de legs / dpag tu ma mchis pa'ang de lags /
translated: It is beyond number.🔽It is beyond measure.

original: tshad ma mchis pa'ang de lags te /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis pa'ang de lags te /
translated: It is beyond limit.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: stong pa nyid la ni grangs kyang mi dmigs /🔽dpag pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni grangs kyang mi dmigs / dpag pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: in emptiness, no number can be apprehended,🔽no measure can be apprehended,

original: tshad kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: tshad kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: and no limit can be apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bas na chos de dag la don tam; yi ges tha dad du bgyi ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bas na chos de dag la don tam; yi ges tha dad du bgyi ba mi dmigs so //
translated: therefore, in these phenomena, no difference can be apprehended in terms of meaning or words.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhuti: So it is, O Lord.

original: de de bzhin te /🔽chos de dag la don tam /
analyzed: de de bzhin te / chos de dag la don tam /
translated: So it is, O Well-Gone.

original: yi ges tha dad du bya ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yi ges tha dad du bya ba mi dmigs so //
translated: In these dharmas no difference is apprehended either in meaning or in letter.

original: rab 'byor / mi zad pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi zad pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Subhuti: The Tathagata has spoken of the inexhaustible,

original: tshad med pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: tshad med pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the immeasurable,

original: stong pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: stong pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: the empty,

original: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'am /

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “When they practice the perfection of generosity,

original: yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: they dedicate those thoughts, those deeds, and those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate in the same way as unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @196b byang chub bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @196b byang chub bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the suchness of all phenomena is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: chos thams cad po gang rnams kyi de bzhin nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad po gang rnams kyi de bzhin nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags /
translated: “Blessed One, the suchness of which phenomena is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: “Subhūti, the suchness of form is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of feeling is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of perception is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of formation is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of consciousness is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the eyes is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the ears is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the nose is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the tongue is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the body is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the mind is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par @197a *//🔽rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par @197a *// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of form is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of sound is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of smell is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of taste is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of touch is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of contact is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo; ;sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo; ;sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of mental phenomena is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of eye consciousness is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of ear consciousness is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. The suchness of nose consciousness is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of tongue consciousness is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the consciousness of the body is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the mental consciousness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @197b pa'i byang chub bo //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @197b pa'i byang chub bo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The thusness of the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The thusness of the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the coming together of tongue, taste, and consciousness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the totality of physical contact is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the totality of mental contact is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the sensation that arises from the condition of the totality of eye contact is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the sensation that arises from the condition of the totality of ear contact is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the sensation that arises from the condition of the totality of nose contact is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the condition of contact through the union of tongue and taste is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla @198a *//
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla @198a *//
translated: The suchness of the condition of contact through the union of body and touch is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the condition of contact through the union of mind and mental phenomena is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the earth element is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the water element is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the fire element is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the wind element is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the space element is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the consciousness element is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of ignorance is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of volitional factors is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of consciousness is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of name and form is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the six sense sources is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa @198b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa @198b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of contact is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of sensation is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of craving is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The thusness of grasping is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of becoming is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of birth is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of old age and death is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the perfection of giving is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the perfection of morality is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the perfection of patience is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the perfection of effort is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the perfection of meditative stability is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽@199a *// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // @199a *// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the perfection of wisdom is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The suchness of inner emptiness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of outer emptiness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of inner and outer emptiness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of emptiness is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the great is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of emptiness that is beginningless and endless is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of emptiness that is not discarded is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: rang @199b bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rang @199b bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of emptiness by nature is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of emptiness of all phenomena is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of emptiness of defining characteristics is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of non-entities is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of essential nature is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo; ;yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo; ;yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. The suchness of the right efforts is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: chub bo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: chub bo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the legs of miraculous power is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the faculties is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid @200a *//🔽gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid @200a *// gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i //
translated: The suchness of the powers is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the branches of enlightenment is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: byang chub bo //
analyzed: byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the noble eightfold path is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the noble eightfold path is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the noble truths is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the concentrations is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the immeasurables is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the formless absorptions is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the liberations is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the formless absorptions is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de @200b bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de @200b bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the superknowledges is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the meditative stabilizations is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. The suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the powers of the tathāgatas is unsurpassed perfect complete awakening.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the fearlessnesses is unsurpassed perfect complete awakening.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo // byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the detailed and thorough knowledges is unsurpassed perfect complete complete awakening.🔽The thusness of great love is unsurpassed perfect complete awakening.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of great compassion is unsurpassed perfect complete awakening.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The thusness of the distinct attributes of a buddha is unsurpassed perfect complete awakening.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang @201a *//🔽dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang @201a *// dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /🔽de ni 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste / de ni 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all bases is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / de la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba rgyun mi chad par rtag tu rnam par spyod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba rgyun mi chad par rtag tu rnam par spyod de /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of paths is unsurpassed

original: chos gang la'ang 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang la'ang 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see any dharma as increasing or decreasing.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na brjod du med pa'i don ni 'phel ba med cing yongs su 'grib pa med pa ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na brjod du med pa'i don ni 'phel ba med cing yongs su 'grib pa med pa ste / rab 'byor / de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
translated: Subhūti, thus the meaning of the inexpressible is neither increased nor decreased.

original: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
analyzed: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
translated: Subhūti, thus the perfection of giving is neither increased nor decreased.

original: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
analyzed: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
translated: The perfection of morality is neither increased nor decreased.🔽The perfection of patience is neither increased nor decreased.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
translated: The perfection of effort is neither increased nor decreased.🔽The perfection of concentration is neither increased nor decreased.

original: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
analyzed: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is neither increased nor decreased.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel ba'ang med do //
translated: In the perfection of wisdom there is no increase.🔽

original: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //🔽nang stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
analyzed: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // nang stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
translated: there is no increase or decrease in the perfection of wisdom.🔽There is no increase or decrease in inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa @201b nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa @201b nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //

analyzed: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //

original: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
analyzed: yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // chen po stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
translated: There is no increase or decrease in the emptiness of emptiness.🔽There is no increase or decrease in great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //🔽yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do // yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'phel ba'ang med do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'phel ba'ang med do //

original: yongs su 'grib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //🔽gsol pa / @203a *//
analyzed: yongs su 'grib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o // gsol pa / @203a *//
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should practice the perfection of wisdom like that, without increase and without decrease.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord:

original: ci lags / sems dang po bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am /🔽'on tam sems slad ma bskyed pas /
analyzed: ci lags / sems dang po bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am / 'on tam sems slad ma bskyed pas /
translated: Subhūti, do you think that the bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening because of the first production of the thought,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya /
translated: or do you think that the bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening because of the later production of the thought?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te sems dang po bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na ni /
analyzed: gal te sems dang po bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na ni /
translated: if a bodhisattva great being were to fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood through the first generation of the mind,

original: sems dang po bskyed pa'ang sems slad ma bskyed pa dang mi 'grogs /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa'ang sems slad ma bskyed pa dang mi 'grogs /
translated: then the first generation of the mind would not be accompanied by the subsequent generations of the mind.

original: sems slad ma bskyed pa'ang sems dang po bskyed pa dang mi 'grogs te /
analyzed: sems slad ma bskyed pa'ang sems dang po bskyed pa dang mi 'grogs te /
translated: And the subsequent generations of the mind would not be accompanied by the first generation of the mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi 'grogs na /
analyzed: de ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi 'grogs na /
translated: if the mind and mental factors are not accompanied in this way,

original: ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams tshogs su 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams tshogs su 'gyur /
translated: how can the roots of virtue come together?

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags par ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags par ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
translated: Without accumulating the roots of virtue, it is not possible to fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / khyod kyis don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / khyod kyis don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan te /
translated: “Subhūti, I will teach an analogy in order to make you understand this very meaning.

original: 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa la bshad pa'i don dpes yongs su shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa la bshad pa'i don dpes yongs su shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this regard, the meaning of the explanation for the wise is fully understood through an example.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: @203b 'bru mar gyi mar me 'bar bas snying po tshig par gyur pa /🔽me lce dang po dang phrad pas snying po de tshig gam /
analyzed: @203b 'bru mar gyi mar me 'bar bas snying po tshig par gyur pa / me lce dang po dang phrad pas snying po de tshig gam /
translated: The wick of a burning oil lamp is burned🔽by the first flame that it encounters,

original: de ste me lce phyi ma dang phrad pas snying po de tshig /
analyzed: de ste me lce phyi ma dang phrad pas snying po de tshig /
translated: or is the wick burned by the last flame that it encounters?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: me lce dang po dang mjal bas kyang snying po de tshig pa ma lags /
analyzed: me lce dang po dang mjal bas kyang snying po de tshig pa ma lags /
translated: the wick is not burned by the first flame that it encounters,

original: me lce dang po la ma brten par yang snying po de tshig pa ma lags /
analyzed: me lce dang po la ma brten par yang snying po de tshig pa ma lags /
translated: nor is the wick burned without relying on the first flame.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: me lce slad ma dang mjal bas kyang snying po de tshig pa ma lags /
analyzed: me lce slad ma dang mjal bas kyang snying po de tshig pa ma lags /
translated: the wick is not burned by the last flame that it encounters,

original: me lce slad ma la ma brten par yang snying po de tshig pa ma lags so //
analyzed: me lce slad ma la ma brten par yang snying po de tshig pa ma lags so //
translated: nor is the wick burned without relying on the last flame.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: 'on kyang snying po de tshig mod /
analyzed: 'on kyang snying po de tshig mod /
translated: Nevertheless, the wick is burned, is it not?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: de ni tshig go /
analyzed: de ni tshig go /
translated: that is a word.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Well-Gone One,

original: de ni tshig go /
analyzed: de ni tshig go /
translated: that is a word.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /🔽sems dang po bskyed pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /🔽sems dang po bskyed pa la ma brten par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te / sems dang po bskyed pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya / sems dang po bskyed pa la ma brten par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so.🔽The bodhisattva great beings do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through the first production of the thought.🔽The bodhisattva great beings do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening without relying on the first production of the thought.

original: sems phyi ma bskyed pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang @204a *//
analyzed: sems phyi ma bskyed pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang @204a *//
translated: The bodhisattva great beings do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through the later production of the thought.

original: mi rgya / sems phyi ma bskyed pa la ma brten par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: mi rgya / sems phyi ma bskyed pa la ma brten par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: and also without relying on the generation of the subsequent thought, a bodhisattva great being does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that a bodhisattva great being does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, here a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: starting from the first production of the thought,

original: sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

original: sa bcu po gang dang gang yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas /
analyzed: sa bcu po gang dang gang yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rab 'byor / dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

original: rigs kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: rigs kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

original: brgyad pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: brgyad pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

original: mthong ba'i sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

analyzed: bsrabs pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang @205a *//

translated: “Therein, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who is training on the ten levels🔽does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through the first production of the thought,

original: sems dang po bskyed pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin /
