original: sems phyi ma bskyed pas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya pa ma yin; sems phyi ma bskyed pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par🔽rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin mod kyi /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang yang rgya'o //

analyzed: de mtshan ma la spyod pa yin nam /

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: des mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnam par bshig pa yin nam /
translated: Is that one who has destroyed the perception of signs?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: it is not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / 'o na ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes rnam par bshig pa yin /🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma rnam par gzhig par bya'o zhe'am /

translated: Subhuti: But how, O Lord, does the Bodhisattva, the great being, destroy the notion of signs?

original: mtshan ma med pa rnam par gzhig par bya'o snyam du mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa rnam par gzhig par bya'o snyam du mi sbyor ro //
translated: Subhuti: The Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in perfect wisdom, does not get hold of the notion that 'I will destroy signs', or that 'I will destroy signlessness'.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa ni /
translated: The Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in perfect wisdom, does not get hold of the notion that 'I will destroy signs', or that 'I will destroy signlessness'.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi @207b 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi @207b 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: without having completed the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, they will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste /
translated: this is the bodhisattva mahāsattvas’ skillful means.

original: thabs mkhas pa des chos gang yang dngos por yang mi bgyid /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa des chos gang yang dngos por yang mi bgyid /
translated: With that skillful means they do not make anything into a thing,

original: dngos po ma mchis par yang mi bgyid do //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po ma mchis par yang mi bgyid do // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: nor do they make anything into a non-thing.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: If you ask why, Bhagavān,

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because bodhisattva mahāsattvas know that the intrinsic identity of all phenomena is empty.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de la gnas nas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de la gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in that emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: sems can rnams kyi don du ting nge 'dzin gsum la snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don du ting nge 'dzin gsum la snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: for the sake of sentient beings they become absorbed in the three meditative stabilizations.

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid na /
translated: If they bring sentient beings to full maturity through those meditative stabilizations,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du ting nge 'dzin gsum la snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du ting nge 'dzin gsum la snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings become absorbed in the three meditative stabilizations for the sake of sentient beings,

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: and how do they bring sentient beings to full maturity through those meditative stabilizations?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,🔽“Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gsum po la @208a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gsum po la @208a *//
translated: abiding in the three meditative stabilizations,

original: gnas shing / sems can gang rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes la spyod pa de dag ni stong pa nyid la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gnas shing / sems can gang rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes la spyod pa de dag ni stong pa nyid la rab tu 'god do //
translated: establish those sentient beings who engage in the discriminations of conceptualization in emptiness.

original: sems can gang mtshan ma la spyod pa de dag ni mtshan ma med pa la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: sems can gang mtshan ma la spyod pa de dag ni mtshan ma med pa la rab tu 'god do //
translated: Those sentient beings who are involved in signs, they establish in signlessness.
